column2: ggplot(sampleMean_data, aes(sample_mean))+geom_histogram(alpha=.5, position="identity", col="black")+geom_vline(xintercept = theoretical_mean, colour="red",show.legend=TRUE)+geom_vline(xintercept = actual_mean, colour="green", show.legend=TRUE)+ggtitle ("Histogram of the sample means ")+xlab("Sample mean")+ylab("Density")
